SELECT P.PATIENT_KEY, P.PATIENT_NAME, P.PATIENT_AGE, P.PATIENT_SEX, R.RECEIPT_KEY, MC.CHART_KEY, WH.WAITING_KEY, WH.WAITING_STATUS, TO_CHAR(WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME,'HH24:MI PM' ) WAITING_CHANGE_TIME, MC.CHART_CONT, OH.ORDER_KEY, CC2.CODE_NAME BODY_PART_KEY, E.EMP_NAME, ME.EQUIPMENT_NAME, ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY, CC3.CODE_NAME WAITING_STATUS_NAME FROM PATIENT P
LEFT OUTER JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.PATIENT_KEY = R.PATIENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN WAITING_HISTORY WH ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = WH.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART MC ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = MC.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME ON ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = OH.EQUIPMENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC1 ON CC1.CODE = R.OFFICE_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.CODE = OH.BODY_PART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.CODE = WH.WAITING_STATUS
WHERE WH.WAITING_LOCATION = 'L006' AND OH.ORDER_KIND = 'O002'
AND (P.PATIENT_KEY, WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME) IN ( SELECT P.PATIENT_KEY, MAX(WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME) FROM PATIENT P LEFT OUTER JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.PATIENT_KEY = R.PATIENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN WAITING_HISTORY WH ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = WH.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART MC ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = MC.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICLA_EQUIPMENT ME ON ME.EQUIPMENT_KEY = OH.EQUIPMENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC1 ON CC1.CODE = R.OFFICE_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.CODE = OH.BODY_PART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.CODE = WH.WAITING_STATUS WHERE WH.WAITING_LOCATION = 'L006' AND OH.ORDER_KIND = 'O002' GROUP BY P.PATIENT_KEY )
ORDER BY WH.WAITING_CHANGE_TIME

SELECT CHART_CONT , MC.CHART_KEY ,P.PATIENT_KEY ,P.PATIENT_NAME ,P.PATIENT_REGNO1 , (SELECT DISEASE_NM_KR FROM DISEASE WHERE DISEASE.DISEASE_KEY = D.DISEASE_KEY) AS DISEASE_NM_KR , (SELECT DISEASE_NM_EN FROM DISEASE WHERE DISEASE.DISEASE_KEY = D.DISEASE_KEY) AS DISEASE_NM_EN , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY) AS EMP_NAME FROM MEDICAL_CHART MC LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON(MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN DIAGNOSIS D ON (MC.CHART_KEY = D.CHART_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT P ON (MC.PATIENT_KEY = P.PATIENT_KEY) WHERE MC.CHART_KEY = ( SELECT CHART_KEY FROM ORDER_HISTORY WHERE ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey} ) AND ORDER_KIND = 'O002'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MT_RECORD ( MT_RECORD_KEY, ORDER_KEY, MT_WRITER, MT_RECORD_DATE ) VALUES ( MT_RECORD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{orderKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mtWriter, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE MT_RECORD SET MT_STRENGTH = #{mtStrength, jdbcType=INTEGER}, MT_ROM = #{mtRom, jdbcType=INTEGER}, MT_PAIN = #{mtPain, jdbcType=INTEGER}, MT_BALANCE = #{mtBalance, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE MT_RECORD_KEY = #{mtRecordKey, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT P.PATIENT_KEY , P.PATIENT_NAME , P.PATIENT_AGE , P.PATIENT_SEX , DI.DISEASE_NM_EN , WH.WAITING_STATUS , OH.ORDER_KEY , (SELECT 'MT_R'|| LPAD(MR.MT_RECORD_KEY, 5, '0') FROM DUAL) MT_RECORD_CODE , TO_CHAR(MR.MT_RECORD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') MT_RECORD_DATE , MR.MT_TIMES , OH.BODY_PART_KEY FROM MEDICAL_CHART MC RIGHT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON OH.CHART_KEY = MC.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN DIAGNOSIS D ON D.CHART_KEY = MC.CHART_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN DISEASE DI ON DI.DISEASE_KEY = D.DISEASE_KEY RIGHT OUTER JOIN RECEIPT R ON R.RECEIPT_KEY = MC.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT P ON P.PATIENT_KEY = R.PATIENT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN WAITING_HISTORY WH ON WH.RECEIPT_KEY = R.RECEIPT_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MT_RECORD MR ON MR.ORDER_KEY = OH.ORDER_KEY WHERE OH.ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE WAITING_HISTORY SET WAITING_STATUS = 'WS01' , WAITING_LOCATION = 'L008' , WAITING_CHANGE_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIPT_KEY = #{receiptKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT MEDICAL_CHART.PATIENT_KEY , A.MT_MMT , A.MT_ROM , A.MT_PAIN , A.MT_BBS , A.ORDER_KEY , TO_CHAR(A.MT_RECORD_DATE, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') MT_RECORD_DATE , A.CHART_KEY FROM( SELECT MT_RECORD.MT_MMT , MT_RECORD.MT_ROM , MT_RECORD.MT_PAIN , MT_RECORD.MT_BBS , MT_RECORD.ORDER_KEY , MT_RECORD.MT_RECORD_KEY , MT_RECORD.MT_RECORD_DATE , ORDER_HISTORY.CHART_KEY FROM MT_RECORD, ORDER_HISTORY WHERE MT_RECORD.ORDER_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY )A, MEDICAL_CHART WHERE A.CHART_KEY = MEDICAL_CHART.CHART_KEY AND MEDICAL_CHART.PATIENT_KEY = #{patientKey} ORDER BY MT_RECORD_DATE ASC

SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM ( SELECT B.*, DI.DISEASE_NM_EN FROM ( SELECT A.*, MC.RECEIPT_KEY, MC.PATIENT_KEY FROM ( SELECT MT_RECORD.MT_MMT, MT_RECORD.MT_ROM, MT_RECORD.MT_PAIN, MT_RECORD.MT_BBS, TO_CHAR(MT_RECORD.MT_RECORD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI PM') AS MT_RECORD_DATE, MT_RECORD.MT_RECORD_CONTENT, MT_RECORD.MT_PLAN_S, MT_RECORD.MT_PLAN_O, MT_RECORD.MT_PLAN_A, MT_RECORD.MT_PLAN_P, MT_RECORD.ORDER_KEY, MT_RECORD.MT_RECORD_KEY, ORDER_HISTORY.CHART_KEY FROM MT_RECORD, ORDER_HISTORY WHERE MT_RECORD.ORDER_KEY = ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_KEY ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART MC ON A.CHART_KEY = MC.CHART_KEY ) B, DIAGNOSIS DA, DISEASE DI WHERE B.CHART_KEY = DA.CHART_KEY AND DI.DISEASE_KEY = DA.DISEASE_KEY AND B.PATIENT_KEY = #{patientKey} ORDER BY B.MT_RECORD_DATE DESC ) C
